title: Russian deputy FM meets Pakistan envoy
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 05 (APP): Deputy Foreign Minister of Russia Andrei Rudenko on Tuesday called on Pakistanâ€™s Ambassador in Moscow Shafqat Ali Khan, who is completing his stint.
In the meeting, they discussed the bilateral as well as international matters.
Rudenko thanked Shafqat Ali Khan for his great contribution to the development of Russian-Pakistani relations, according to a press release.
